seniority_level.evidence: 3+ years minimum experience with 5-7 years preferred, Application Developer title suggests mid-level role

job_family.evidence: Description explicitly states 'As a Data Engineer' with focus on data gathering, storage, and processing

sub_specialty.evidence: BPM-focused role with Appian, IBM BPM, Pega, Camunda tools - general process automation specialty

leadership_expectation.evidence: No mention of team leadership, mentoring, or direct reports - pure individual contributor focus

primary_cloud.evidence: No cloud providers (AWS, Azure, GCP) mentioned anywhere in the job posting

secondary_clouds.evidence: No cloud providers mentioned, so no secondary clouds

processing_paradigm.evidence: Description explicitly mentions 'both batch and real-time processing' capabilities

orchestrator_category.evidence: No orchestration tools (Airflow, Spark, dbt, etc.) mentioned in the requirements

storage_layer.evidence: Mentions databases (Oracle SQL, MySQL) but no specific data warehouse, lake, or lakehouse technologies

remote_restriction.evidence: Location restricted to Bengaluru East, Karnataka, India with onsite work model required

timezone_focus.evidence: Location specifically Bengaluru, India with no timezone flexibility mentioned

relocation_required.evidence: Pass 1 shows 'must_be_resident' requirement suggesting candidates should already be in Bengaluru area

h1b_friendly.evidence: No visa sponsorship mentioned in job posting, and location is India-specific

opt_cpt_friendly.evidence: No mention of student visa support, work authorization requirement suggests no student visa accommodation

citizenship_required.evidence: Must be resident in India with work authorization, no citizenship requirement specified

w2_vs_1099.evidence: Full-time permanent position with IBM suggests traditional W2 employment

benefits_level.evidence: No benefits, equity, PTO, or compensation details mentioned anywhere in the job posting

growth_path_clarity.evidence: No mention of career paths, growth opportunities, or advancement potential

mentorship_signals.evidence: Mentions collaborating with diverse teams but no formal mentorship or senior guidance programs

promotion_path_mentioned.evidence: No mention of promotion, advancement, or career progression opportunities

internal_mobility_mentioned.evidence: No mention of internal transfers, role changes, or mobility opportunities

career_tracks_available.evidence: No career tracks, paths, or advancement opportunities mentioned

requirement_strictness.evidence: Clear distinction between required (3+ years Appian, database knowledge) and preferred (5-7 years BPM, 2+ years Appian) qualifications

scope_definition.evidence: Focused BPM/Process Management role with well-defined responsibilities and specific tool requirements

skill_inflation_detected.evidence: 3-7 years experience requirements are reasonable for mid-level BPM role with appropriate skill expectations
